snippet: Crystal Palace on a cold English winter’s day is a world away from the Nou Camp, but the few moments that illuminated Stoke City’s 1-1 draw on Saturday came from Barcelona old boy Bojan Krkic....

headline.print_headline: Barca Graduate Lights Up Dull Palace Affair
headline.main: Barca Graduate Lights Up Dull Palace Affair

lead_paragraph: Crystal Palace on a cold English winter’s day is a world away from the Nou Camp, but the few moments that illuminated Stoke City’s 1-1 draw on Saturday came from Barcelona old boy Bojan Krkic.
